formattedAddress: 450 Greenwich St, New York, NY 10013, USA
adrFormatAddress: 450 Greenwich St, New York, NY 10013-1710, USA

originalText.text: The Lodge is NEXT LEVEL! KC and Matt have created something more than a neighborhood gym - The Lodge is an experience anchored by energy, excellence, motivation, and inspiration. Plus, it all goes down in a cool environment where everyone is made to feel welcome and a part of something special by the best trainers in the biz!

text.text: The Lodge is NEXT LEVEL! KC and Matt have created something more than a neighborhood gym - The Lodge is an experience anchored by energy, excellence, motivation, and inspiration. Plus, it all goes down in a cool environment where everyone is made to feel welcome and a part of something special by the best trainers in the biz!

originalText.text: As soon as you get to the Lodge you’ll know it’s not going to be a typical gym experience. KC and Matt have created a beautiful space and the effort they have put into cultivating a fun, positive and encouraging environment is incredible. I’d recommend any of the trainers, but if you steal my slot I will come for you!  My only regret is not starting with The Lodge earlier - don’t make the same mistake.

text.text: As soon as you get to the Lodge you’ll know it’s not going to be a typical gym experience. KC and Matt have created a beautiful space and the effort they have put into cultivating a fun, positive and encouraging environment is incredible. I’d recommend any of the trainers, but if you steal my slot I will come for you!  My only regret is not starting with The Lodge earlier - don’t make the same mistake.

originalText.text: You guys, this place is the best. A neighbor suggested I stop by a few months ago and I’m so happy I did. Matt and KC have created a high-energy, low-ego gym environment where the workouts are tough but the trainers make coming back easy. Good music, good people, and the best energy keep even the sweatiest sessions fun and make the hour pass by so quickly. 10/10 would recommend to anyone on the market for a new routine.

text.text: You guys, this place is the best. A neighbor suggested I stop by a few months ago and I’m so happy I did. Matt and KC have created a high-energy, low-ego gym environment where the workouts are tough but the trainers make coming back easy. Good music, good people, and the best energy keep even the sweatiest sessions fun and make the hour pass by so quickly. 10/10 would recommend to anyone on the market for a new routine.

originalText.text:
Amazing personal training gym - highly recommend.  Team has completely evolved my fitness routine and the results are recognizable within 2 months.

Trainers are extremely knowledgable, friendly, & really care about tailoring the workout to your level. Space is clean and always enjoyable as they limit the number of people working out at one time to maintain the environment.

originalText.text: Without a doubt, the best gym in NYC! KC and Matt are experienced, talented trainers who truly care about creating the best workout experience while kicking your butt at the same time.  The gym is new, clean and beautiful.  You are guaranteed a fun, individualized workout every time…
